meta.title: From SUNSET to BOULEVARD
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: We're honoring the Tony nominations this week. Andrew Lloyd Webber's "Sunset Boulevard" was nominated for seven Tonys, including Best Revival of a Musical, and Best Performance by an Actress in a Musical for Nicole Scherzinger‚Äç.

ladder.clue: The time of day immediately following <>
What comes before the <>, it's said
Take the last part of <>, and change a letter to get a number
Animal who is <>, in a book and movie
Anagram <> to get a luxury monogram
What the middle letter of <> stands for
The abbreviation for <> also stands for this, on signs
